color-menu(transform-color) { 
    nav { 
        background-color: transform-color(#dbffdb); 
    } 
 
    #help { 
        background-color: transform-color(#ff6a6a); 
 
        a { 
            color: transform-color(#000); 
        } 
    } 
 
    a { 
        color: transform-color(#006400) 
    } 
} 
 
color-menu(invert);
